Parameters.Name: pLogOutput
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Write parameters and action summary to server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pStrictErrorHandling
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: On encountering any error, exit with major error status by ProcessQuit after writing to the server message log (Boolean True = 1)

Parameters.Name: pSrcHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Source Hierarchy, If not specified takes the default Hierarchy

Parameters.Name: pTgtHier
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Target Hierarchy, If not specified, takes the same name as attribute

Parameters.Name: pTopNode
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: The name of the Target Hierarchy top element (will default to 'All ' attribute name)

Parameters.Name: pPrefix
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Prefix before the attribute value

Parameters.Name: pSuffix
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Suffix after the attribute value

Parameters.Name: pSkipBlank
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: To manage empty attribute: 0 = Skip, 1 = Send to unallocated node (by default blank attribute values are skipped)

Parameters.Name: pUnallocated
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Naming convention for rollup if attribute is empty (eg. Unallocated <pAttr>, No <pAttr>, Undefined <pAttr>)

Parameters.Name: pUnwind
Parameters.Prompt: OPTIONAL: Unwind target hierarchy (0 = Delete all elements, 1 = Unwind hierarchy and keep elements)
